title: The Krusty Krab
description: SpongeBob SquarePants has branched out into our world with its first official real life restaurant, and fans in at Berties will be able to check it out at hopefully prices not set by Mr. Krabs! Open to the public at Berties, Liverpool England. The Burguer & Restaurante is the first official standalone restaurant for the SpongeBob SquarePants franchise. In partnership with Berties, this restaurant specializes in food, areas for childrenâ€™s entertainment, and retail stores all within the same space. All the while fans will be able to show off their love for SpongeBob SquarePants.
